# bps: validations: timing-simulation-v1

## 3 nodes

```bash
@select bps-timing-simulation-$(@@timestamp)

@bps simulate timing upload .

@assets publish extensions=png,push .
```


mean overlap: 0.09

<summary>metadata</summary>

## 12 nodes

```bash
@select bps-timing-simulation-$(@@timestamp)

@bps simulate timing upload . \
    --nodes 12

@assets publish extensions=png,push .
```

## 3 nodes (variable ta)

```bash
@select bps-timing-simulation-$(@@timestamp)

@bps simulate timing upload . \
    --ta1 24 \
    --ta2 36

@assets publish extensions=png,push .
```


mean overlap: 0.1


<details>
<summary>metadata</summary>

```yaml
mean-overlap: 0.1

- - 0.0
  - 0.10166666666666667
  - 0.08416666666666667
- - 0.1025
  - 0.0
  - 0.10583333333333333
- - 0.10666666666666667
  - 0.11666666666666667
  - 0.0
```

## 3 nodes (more variability)

```bash
@select bps-timing-simulation-$(@@timestamp)

@bps simulate timing upload . \
    --ta1 20 \
    --ta2 40 \
    --tr1 20 \
    --tr2 40

@assets publish extensions=png,push .
```


mean overlap: 0.17

## 12 nodes (more variability)

```bash
@select bps-timing-simulation-$(@@timestamp)

@bps simulate timing upload . \
    --ta1 20 \
    --ta2 40 \
    --tr1 20 \
    --tr2 40 \
    --nodes 12

@assets publish extensions=png,push .
```
